sentences.sContent: Greenpeace has been invited to appraise the environmental costs of such an operation.
sentences.sCn: 绿色和平组织已受邀评估这样一次行动对环境的影响。

remMethod.val: ap(给， 向) + prais(价格) + e → 给定价 → 估价； 评价

words.tran: 评价；估价（尤指估价财产，以便征税）；估计

trans.tranCn: 估价； 估量； 评价， 评定
trans.tranOther: to officially judge how successful, effective, or valuable something is
